name: TheBibleSays
0:
”Alexa ask The Bible Says if I should go fishing this weekend.”
”Alexa ask The Bible Says if it is ok to not judge others.”
”Alexa ask The Bible Says if it is ok to listen to rock and roll music.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the bible says
des: Have a question or need help deciding on what to do? Ask Alexa to see what The Bible Says. Alexa will search the Bible and help you decide what to do by referencing the scripture.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
